title: NA40026: Heat Engines - Quick Facts
text:
NA40026
Course name | Heat Engines
Offered by | Ocean Engineering & Naval Architecture
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Principles of heat transfer; Component efficiency in steam propulsion plants; Effects of contamination and blowdown; Thermodynamics of steam turbines, diesel engines and gas turbines; Stoichiometric analysis of fuels; Air requirements. Analysis of flue gases; Air compressors; Ventilation, air conditioning and refrigeration in ships.
